# Copilot Instructions

## General Guidelines
- Provide feedback aligned with SOLID Principles, Clean Code, and Clean Architecture.
- Ensure that code suggestions promote maintainability and scalability.

## Code Style
- Follow specific formatting rules that enhance readability.
- Adhere to naming conventions that reflect the purpose and functionality of the code.

## Project-Specific Rules
- Implement design patterns that align with Clean Architecture principles.
- Prioritize code simplicity and clarity in all implementations.
